attributes.action: Regulate the sale of combat and hunting knives over the internet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many websites selling combat/hunting/survival daggers with no proof of age required by the seller. At a time when knife crime is out of control, anyone of any age can buy these weapons which are designed to cause as much damage as possible.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
